direction.raw_text: . LEIGH ANNE'S CAR - DAY 197 Leigh Anne drives around, looking for Michael at Wingate. 198 EXT. WEST SIDE OF MEMPHIS STREET - DAY 198 The streets of west side of Memphis. And finally -- 199 EXT. HURT VILLAGE - DAY 199 Leigh Anne approaches the complex. Alton, his face bandaged, sits on the stoop with his crowd. A mother holds the unharmed baby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He gone. Leigh Anne stops, looks to Alton.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But you tell him I'll be seeing him around. You tell him he'll get his.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Michael was here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Last night. Sneaked me then took off like a little bitch. So you tell him, sleep with one eye open. Yod'hear me, bitch?' Leigh Anne steps closer to Alton, stares him down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, you hear me, bitch. You threaten my son you threaten me. You so much as cross downtown you'll be sorry. I'm in a prayer group with the D.A., I'm a member of the NRA and I am always packing. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 199 She taps her tiny purse. Alton laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What you got in there, a .22? You got yourself a Saturday Night Special?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And it shoots just fine all the other days, too. She turns on her heels and strides to her car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LEIGH ANNE'S CAR - DAY 200 When she gets in she's so nervous she hyperventilates. Her phone RINGS and she opens the tiny purse revealing nothing more than a wallet and the phone. She recognizes the number and answers...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Michael?!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mama?...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LAUNDROMAT - DAY 201 The one where Michael spent the night. He sits inside. Leigh Anne pulls up, stops and they lock eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) You think the police gonna come and get me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CURB - DAY 202 Leigh Anne sits on the curb with Michael.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd imagine the last thing anybody at Hurt Village wants is cops snooping around. (after a beat) I swore I'd never ask but... how'd you make it out of there, Michael? MICHAEL When I was little and something awful was happening, my Mama would tell me to close my eyes. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 202 MICHAEL (CONT'D) She was tryin' to keep me from seeing her do drugs or other bad things. And she'd say, "keep 'em closed till I say so." And then when she was finished or the bad things were over she'd say, "now when I count to three, you open your eyes and the past is gone, the world is a good place, and it's all gonna be okay."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You closed your eyes. He nods. She shakes her head, amazed at the kid. They stare out at the street, then...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, when I was driving all over Kingdom Come looking for you I just kept thinking about one thing. (BEAT) Ferdinand the bull. Everyone assumed because he was big that he wanted to fight in the ring. But he just wanted to sit under a tree and smell the flowers. (right at him) I know I should have asked this a long time ago but do you even wanna play football? I mean, do you even like it?' Michael considers this. MICHAEL I'm pretty good at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, you are. (A BEAT) Sean and I have been talking and Michael, if you're gonna accept a football scholarship we think it should be from Tennessee. (off his look) And I promise you I will be at every game cheering for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Every game? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 202 LEIGH ANNE But I will not wear that gaudy orange of theirs because it's not in my color wheel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want me to go to Tennessee?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want you to go wherever you want. It's your decision, Michael. It's your life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What if I wanted to flip burgers? She takes this in, swallows hard and LEIGH ANNE Your decision; your life. Michael smiles. MICHAEL Okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NONDESCRIPT GOVERNMENT-LOOKING ROOM - DAY 203 Michael is at another session with Jocelyn Granger. MICHAEL I'm sorry I left the other day.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were pretty upset.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You ask a lot of questions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm trying to get to the bottom of this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But all the questions you asked were about why everybody else wanted me to go to Ole Miss. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 203 GRANGER Okay...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You asked about everybody but me. You never asked why I wanted to go there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, fine, Michael... why do you want to go to Ole Miss?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's where my family goes to school. It's where they've always gone to school. Granger considers this, stares at Michael, then almost, just almost, smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . OLE MISS DORM - DAY 204 Cars are unloaded as parents and siblings move their kids into the dorm. Tearful good-byes and lots of picture taking. Leigh Anne and.Sean walk from the dorm toward the car, giving last words of advice. SJ and.Collins are there, too. LEIGH ANNE College is going to be a different experience for you. There are lots of distractions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just have fun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There'll always be some nimrod in the dorm who wants to play video games all night, or goof off on the internet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're gonna have a great time. I know I did. Leigh Anne gives Sean a look - "You're not helping." (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 204 LEIGH ANNE You'll spend lots of time at practice which means you have to be very dedicated to your studies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Relax, Mama. Miss Sue walks up carrying papers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just got back from the library where I reserved a private cubicle for the semester. (hands sheets to Michael) Here's your class schedule and our study hall hours. She reaches in her purse for her keys.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, if y'all don't mind I'm gonna go move into my new apartment. She walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, Miss Sue.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, yeah, yeah... Sean and Michael and SJ eye a GROUP OF ATTRACTIVE COEDS sashaying past. SJ does a little dance move and laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have a lot of fun. Leigh Anne notices their looks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Michael Oher, you listen to me. I want you to enjoy yourself but you need to know that if you get a girl pregnant out of wedlock I will climb in the car, drive here to Oxford and cut off your penis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sotto: to Michael) She means it. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes ma'am. Leigh Anne gives Sean a look that says, "let's get on the road." Sean offers a hand; Michael shakes it. Collins high fives him. SJ offers a fist; Michael knocks it. Leigh Anne, tearing up, nods and gives Michael a quick hug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, Mama. Overwhelmed, she turns for the car with a little wave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The 78'll be a parking lot. We should go. She gets inside and closes the door for privacy. Sean, SJ, Collins and Michael stand there, watching her cry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why does she always do that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's an onion, Michael. You have to peel her one layer at a time. Michael walks over to the car, knocks on the window. She rolls it down, dabbing tears from her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need a proper hug. She gets out of the car and holds him for a long time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: AND KILLED" LEIGH ANNE'S VOICE I read a story the other day about a boy from the projects. No daddy, in and out of foster care. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He'd been killed in a gang fight at Hurt Village.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A newspaper photo of a dead boy from the.projects. Then another headline, another young, black face. Another and another, until the last headline shows a photo of David, Alton's minion - his face full of shining promise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the last paragraph they talked about his superb athletic skills and how different his life might have been if he hadn't fallen behind and dropped out of school. He was twenty-one years old the day he died. It was his birthday.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lonely, falling apart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That could have been anyone. It could have been my son, Michael.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Beautiful on a fall day. And then THE STILL COMES TO LIFE and Michael, books in hand, ENTERS FRAME walking. It's like the other Michael/crowd shots with one difference - this time he moves at the same speed as everyone else.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: 208 STILL PHOTO OF OLE MISS CAMPUS 208

direction.raw_text: But it wasn't. And I suppose I have God to thank for that. God and Lawrence Taylor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SEAN'S CAR - DAY A209 As the family drives home from Ole Miss, we notice that Leigh Anne is very still. And very content. She closes her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One Mississippi...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Michael Oher was a freshman All-American in his first season and, with help from Miss Sue, made the Dean's List. Collins followed in her Mom's footsteps and became a cheerleader at Ole Miss. Sean and Leigh Anne still live in Memphis.
direction.name: direction
